Posts.Content: Just wanted all of you wonderful supportive ladies here that I had my surgery on Tues. 15th, and everything went very well. Got everything, none in lymphs, and feeling great. I want to thank you and would love to keep in touch with everyone and be part of the PCE. I do believe I did see a couple of pink feathers floating around in the operating room. Thank you all again Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Done with surgery

Posts.Content:
thanks ladies, just wondering... 
When you have a mastectomy and reconstructive surgery do they do it all at once, same day etc. ? Still trying to make up my mind on mas or lumpectomy. Guess we need to see what shows up on the Pet Scan on Thursday. Do many ladies have problems with the radiation treatment? Yesterday someone told me that there sister had radiation and it damaged her lung, and she wish she would have had the mastectomy. So here I am and my dear reliable site and asking my new friends.... Thanks again to all of you for your wonderful support, I can't tell you have glad I am that I found you. Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: HI ALL.... I had a bio on Friday the 25th and results on Monday the 28th. so from here we are off and running.. I'm really enjoying all the feedback. Did anyone have a reaction to the radation treatment? Thanks to all hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Just found out
So my doctor won't let me sing Lori's song..........

Posts.Content: Tammy possitive, please keep me posted.... Everyone well be there for you.... You'll be in my prayers Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Hi and welcome Possitive...

Posts.Content:
What do the post icons stand for? I notice I only have a pencil and x and the others have hand etc. I know this probably isn't important but just wanted to know. 
I go for my MRI tomorrow evening, things seem to be rolling along. Thanks for all of your support... Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Thank you Candy... and am so glad that you got two new perky ones..LOL this site has been the best thing for me, just joined today and already many nice ladies have written to me, has made my day... Thanks again Hugs back to ya Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Candy you well be in my prayers for a speedy recovery. Hope the ladies can pick me up in Vegas on the PCE and be there with you during surgery. Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Friday 3/4

Posts.Content: I Love it you ladies have made my day.. I can't believe how many I have heard from in just one day. I'll be looking for the PCE on the 15th of this month. Thanks for everything Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Club explanations please

Posts.Content: Come on to Vegas and you can wear your hot pink shorts.... Be sure to be on the PCE... he, he You are all wonderful ... thank you
Posts.Title: Club explanations please

Posts.Content: I'm so thrilled I have heard from you so fast. I have my choice of a lumpectomy or mastectomy. I have my MRI on the 8th and Pet Scan on the 10th and surgery on the 15th. They explained both of my choices but can't decide what I want for sure. Radiation for 6 wks or go for the complete job. Thanks again for your support and help, I believe I have found some wonderful new friends.
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Nancyjo from Las Vegas, Nv age 62 Just found out on Monday I have breast cancer would love to talk to some other women about the surgery
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Hi Tammy, My name is Nancy and I can't give you any advise since I just found out a week ago, and mine is also in my left breast. I can give you support and prayers. I have my surgery on the 10th one week after you. Are you having a lumpectomy or mastectomy? I still haven't made up my mind, but let me tell you it has been the best thing that has happened to me when I found this site. The ladies on here are wonderful. My husband can't get over how many messages I received the first day, sure did make my day. So Tammy you now have lots of new friends that really support you. You well be in my prayers and good luck tomorrow....Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Thank you Lori, I'm not opposed to radiation at all, just checking with all of you wonderful people about side effects. Did you have chem also? I find it best to come on this site and let it all out and find out with others here have been through.. He said, she said from people that haven't been there just doesn' t hack it for me. Thanks you again.... I keep checking, time getting closer...., Hugs Nancyjo
Posts.Title: Radiation side effects??
